pr_title: HDDS-4140. Auto-close /pending pull requests after 21 days of inactivity

timeline.message: make it work with apache repo
use 3 weeks of inactivity as the limit

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be better to run this workflow once per day instead of every 5 minutes.  The list of pending PRs to be closed is filtered only by date (eg. 2020-08-03), not time, so most of the runs would be no-ops.
